Surprise Menu.Description:
- A delicious assortment of **freshly prepared dishes**.
- A Surprise 3-Course Experience.
- Each course is a unique surprise, made to order, for a truly one-of-a-kind dining experience!

Appetizers.Description: -Crispy toasted bread topped with fresh diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.
-Button mushrooms filled with a savory mix of breadcrumbs, garlic, herbs, and Parmesan cheese, baked to perfection.
-Sicilian rice balls stuffed with mozzarella and peas, coated in breadcrumbs, and fried until golden.
Lightly battered and golden-fried squid rings, served with a tangy marinara dipping sauce.
Crispy vegetable-filled rolls served with a sweet chili dipping sauce.

Soups & Salads.Description: -Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing; optional grilled chicken or shrimp.
-Creamy tomato soup with a hint of basil.
-Fresh tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and red onions, drizzled with olive oil and oregano.
Creamy soup with fresh clams, potatoes, and a touch of smoky bacon.
A hearty Italian vegetable soup with pasta and beans, seasoned with fresh herbs.
A classic French salad with tuna, hard-boiled eggs, green beans, potatoes, and olives.

Main Courses.Description: -Grilled chicken served with a fresh lemon herb sauce.
-Pasta with eggs, bacon, parmesan, and black pepper.
-Tender beef fillet wrapped in a layer of duxelles (finely chopped mushrooms) and golden puff pastry, cooked to perfection.
-Stir-fried vegetables and tofu in a savory sauce.
-Scampi cooked in a garlic butter sauce.
Fresh salmon fillet glazed with teriyaki sauce, served with steamed rice and stir-fried vegetables.

Side Dishes.Dish: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Balsamic Glaze
Side Dishes.Description: -Crispy roasted Brussels sprouts drizzled with balsamic glaze.
-Golden sweet potato fries with a perfect balance of sweetness and salt.
-Rich and creamy spinach cooked to perfection.

Desserts.Description: -Smooth and creamy cheesecake topped with fresh strawberries.
-A rich Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cream, and cocoa powder.
-Warm molten chocolate cake served with vanilla ice cream.
-Fresh seasonal fruits drizzled with honey and topped with mint.
-Creamy vanilla custard topped with a caramelized sugar crust.
-A luxurious selection of mini desserts including Tiramisu, Crème Brûlée, Chocolate Fondant, Panna Cotta, and a scoop of artisan gelato. Perfect for sharing or indulging solo!

Drinks.Description: -Espresso with steamed milk and a layer of frothy foam.
-Creamy espresso with steamed milk, topped with a light foam.
-A smooth, medium-bodied red wine from the region.
-The classic fizzy cola drink, served chilled.
-A crisp and slightly bitter carbonated drink.
-Refreshing cocktail with white rum, lime, mint, sugar, and soda water.
